availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John S. Utley (Hopkins County, Ky, farm laborer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Hopkins County, Kentucky, native. Son of Royal Utley and Mary Utley. Married to Anne Mariah Sisk Utley in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on October 15, 1857. Father of Virginia B. Utley, Gustavus Utley, Idella Utley, and Ella Utley. Farm laborer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 754.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Charleston, p. 89A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Marriages.
"John S. Utley (1826-1885)," Find A Grave, Memorial #50454873, accessed October 28, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/50454873.
